overview: Zhang Zhendong was poor and poor. After his grandfather died, he was often bullied by the village chief's son, Bai San, and accidentally obtained a strange book "No Begging". After a small test, Zhang Zhendong became a well-known doctor in the village. At the same time, the evil forces are brewing a big conspiracy. Zhang Zhendong and Liu Yuexiang met, and the two started a journey of escape. On the way, the two avoided the kidnappers all the way. On the way back to the city, I met the kidnappers again. Cai Jingjing, an Internet celebrity female anchor who travels to the countryside, pesters Zhang Zhendong to worship him as a teacher, and follows Zhang Zhendong and Liu Yuexiang into the city. The uninvited guest suddenly arrived, and Zhang Zhendong suddenly understood that there were many conspiracies along the way.
title: The Rural Master Doctor
